name: Firefly (itch) (Massacre_Candy)
description:
Firefly is is a side-scrolling platformer puzzle game based on light and color. Firefly is all about the journey of getting out of the magical forest by using the different fireflies as guides.

Coders:

  • Andrew Patton
  • William Rutledge

Artists:

  • Jasmine Spurlin
  • Mackenzie Spurlock
